item.title: [HIVE-8879] Upgrade derby version to address race candition
item.description:

item.summary: Upgrade derby version to address race candition

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Looks like hive uses derby 10.10.1.1, and this was fixed in 10.10.2.0 and 10.11.1.1 - those seem minor enough version bumps that we should be okay to bump our derby deps to for our unit tests.

I have also encountered this Derby bug ava.sql.SQLNonTransientConnectionException on linux if you run all Hive tests serially.
